betterquesting:10.desc:8:
AgriCraft lets you breed crops to improve their stats, similar to breeding animals.

To do this, place four Crop Sticks in a 2x2 grid on tilled soil. Plant two mature crops of the same type (like wheat) diagonally across from each other. Then, right-click the other two Crop Sticks with another Crop Stick to turn them into Cross Sticks. 

[img height=100]resources:CropSticks.png[/img]

A new crop will grow on the Cross Sticks, hopefully with better stats than its parents. Watch out for weedsâ€”they can appear on Cross Sticks and destroy your crops if not removed quickly!
